meanings.definition: An outstanding or remarkable person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The magician's performance was a real humdinger.
meanings.sent2: The new roller coaster at the theme park is a humdinger.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot was a humdinger at the party, entertaining everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her idea to use drones for delivery was a humdinger in the world of technology.
meanings.sent5: The diamond necklace she wore was a humdinger, sparkling in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Something that is particularly impressive or noteworthy.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display on New Year's Eve was a humdinger.
meanings.sent2: The grand finale of the concert was a real humdinger.
meanings.sent3: The giant cake at the party was a humdinger, towering over the guests.
meanings.sent4: The storm that hit the town was a humdinger, causing widespread damage.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's winning streak was a humdinger, capturing everyone's attention.
